item.title: Indians spent average 30 minutes per day consuming memes: Report TNN / Sep 01, 2022, 11:07 (IST) Indians are spending close to 30 minutes a day on the internet just consuming memes and over 80% have increased their meme consumption in the last one year, a study by consulting firm Redseer on Monday showed.

item.title: Malayalam TV show Koodevide's recent episode with Elon Musk reference becomes fodder for memes etimes.in / Sep 27, 2022, 17:52 (IST) In the recent episode of 'Koodevide', characters Adithyan, Rishi, Surya, and Aditi were seen having a conversation. In the chat, Adithyan, played by Anil Mohan informs Surya (Anishitha) that one of her projects was selected for a national conference. Further, he adds that the guest of the conference will be none other than her idol, Elon Musk.

item.title: A meme around Vijay Sethupathi and Kamal Haasan goes viral etimes.in / May 19, 2022, 15:27 (IST) Vijay Sethupathi is one of the popular South Indian actors, and he has worked hard to be at the top place where he is today. Vijay Sethupathi is next playing the antagonist against Kamal Haasan in 'Vikram', which is directed by Lokesh Kanagaraj, and the film's trailer and songs were launched recently in Chennai in a grand way. Vijay Sethupathi was spotted sitting next to Kamal Haasan at the 'Vikram' trailer launch, and fans found an old picture of the actor to create a meme. The throwback picture features Kamal Haasan at the launch of Vijay Sethupathi's 'Naduvula Konjam Pakkatha Kaanom' songs, where Vijay is spotted at the corner in the picture.
item.dc:creator: https://www.offcampuscareer.com/sitemapscanner/new

item.title: Exclusive - Rannvijay Singha on the viral video of him offering MBA program to an IIT-PhD: I’ve done Splitsvilla and Roadies and by now I am used to memes, spoofs etimes.in / Feb 22, 2022, 07:00 (IST) Rannvijay for the first time in an exclusive chat with ETimes has reacted to the viral memes and the video clip becoming a hot topic on the internet. The host-turned-actor shared that he has done Roadies and Splistvilla and by now he used to spoofs and memes on him.
